cast.overview: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider, whom takes the youth under his wing.
cast.title: Wall Street

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Grant Shaud (born Edward Shaud III; February 27, 1961) is an American actor known for playing the character of Miles Silverberg on the 1990s TV sitcom Murphy Brown.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Grant Shaud,licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Grant Shaud
